title: Bamboo cotton buds
subTitle: Eco-friendly alternative to the usual plastic cotton buds

marketingArguments.title: 100% Biodegradable
marketingArguments.speech: Made of bamboo and pure cotton. Both are environmentally sustainable materials. Also, the bamboo is the world's fastest naturally renewing resource. When the cotton bud is used, it can simply be added to your home compost.

marketingArguments.title: Eco-friendly packaging
marketingArguments.speech: Packaging made of recycled and recyclable materials. To us cardboard is a noble material given that it is produced from tree fibres and that it can be recycled many times over.  No plastic sticker, we just kept what is useful here.
